title: legacy-geth trace failed because of `out of gas`
body: **Describe the bug** I use a self-hosting legacy-geth to trace blocks to get internal transactions. I find some block trace requests failed with an `out of gas` error. But its receipt status is success, also they will succeed in https://mainnet.optimism.io/. Those error traces occured when block number > 3 million. They cost more gas in executing some instructions than they did in https://mainnet.optimism.io/, so they failed with a `out of gas` error. I checked logs, got below content: ``` Initialised chain configuration config="{ChainID: 10 Homestead: 0 DAO: DAOSupport: false EIP150: 0 EIP155: 0 EIP158: 0 Byzantium: 0 Constantinople: 0 Petersburg: 0 Istanbul: 0, Muir Glacier: 0, Engine: clique}" ``` It seems like my chain configuration is broken. This may explain why incorrect gas cost in my fullnode. I downloaded the chaindata from https://community.optimism.io/docs/useful-tools/networks/#parameters-for-node-operators. I verified the archive through a sha512 checksum calculation, it's ok. Anyone can help me, thank you! **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. download legacy-geth chaindata from https://community.optimism.io/docs/useful-tools/networks/#parameters-for-node-operators 2. start a legacy-geth using extracted chaindata 3. check the log, you will see the wrong chain configuration. I did multiple times. 4. do a trace block request, example block number: 3950111 ``` curl --location 'https://mainnet.optimism.io' \ --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \ --data '{ "method": "debug_traceBlockByNumber", "params": [ "0x3c461f", { "tracer": "callTracer" } ], "id": 1, "jsonrpc": "2.0" }' ``` **Expected behavior** trace got success as it does in https://mainnet.optimism.io/. **Screenshots** this is legacy-geth log ![image](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/assets/12810364/ddf3f3a0-1ae1-48be-9390-d8e22f9b6de1) this is docker config ![image](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/assets/12810364/b1ad0e40-b12d-4e20-8798-684c8610130d) this is trace response difference **System Specs:** - OS: aws linux - Package Version (or commit hash): ethereumoptimism/l2geth:0.5.3 **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.
